text: @GavinNewsom 2/2)The govt leaders have created what I term "well-being asphyxiation". Our beings are being drained of breath, of life. Econ measures are leaving behind 70+% of the pop as they drown in financial despair. Reach out, I have ideas on solutions #COVID19 #California #CincoAtHome
